alert.note: Alert for Southern San Luis Valley; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Huerfano, southern Costilla and southeastern Conejos Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 430 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near San Acacio, or 26 miles southeast of San Luis Valley Airport, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southern Spring Burn Scar south of Highway 160 in Huerfano county, San Luis, Mesita, Cuchara, San Acacio, San Pablo, Sanchez Reservoir, Jaroso, Chama and Garcia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern San Luis Valley; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft
